reason: This node has no declared dependencies, but it relies on: (1) The full-rank assumption (node 1.1) to ensure rho(t) > 0, which is required for the Frechet derivative D_log(rho(t)) to exist and for rho(t)^{-1} to make sense. (2) The interpolating_path definition for rho(t) = (1-t)rho_AB + t sigma_AB, which gives rho'(t) = delta_AB. These should be declared as dependencies for completeness.
